description: Connect to LangGraph agents via the LangGraph Platform API

credential_fields.label: Assistant ID
credential_fields.tooltip: The assistant/agent ID from your LangGraph deployment

credential_fields.label: LangGraph API Base
credential_fields.tooltip: The base URL for your LangGraph server (e.g., http://localhost:2024 or your deployed LangGraph Cloud URL)

credential_fields.label: LangGraph API Key
credential_fields.tooltip: API key for authenticating with your LangGraph server (optional for local development)

description: Connect to Amazon Bedrock AgentCore hosted agent runtimes

credential_fields.label: Agent Runtime ARN
credential_fields.tooltip: The ARN of your Bedrock AgentCore runtime. Find this in your AWS Bedrock console under AgentCore.

description: Connect to Microsoft Azure AI Foundry agents

credential_fields.label: Agent ID
credential_fields.tooltip: The agent/assistant ID from your Azure AI Foundry project (e.g., asst_abc123)

credential_fields.label: Azure AI API Base
credential_fields.tooltip: The base URL for your Azure AI Foundry project endpoint (e.g., https://your-resource.services.ai.azure.com/api/projects/your-project)

credential_fields.label: Azure AD Token
credential_fields.tooltip: Azure AD Bearer token for authentication. Optional if using Service Principal credentials below. Get via: az account get-access-token --resource https://ai.azure.com

credential_fields.label: Azure Tenant ID
credential_fields.tooltip: Azure AD Tenant ID for Service Principal authentication. Find in Azure Portal > Azure Active Directory > Overview

credential_fields.label: Azure Client ID
credential_fields.tooltip: Application (client) ID of your Service Principal. Find in Azure Portal > App registrations > your app

credential_fields.label: Azure Client Secret
credential_fields.tooltip: Client secret for your Service Principal. Create in Azure Portal > App registrations > your app > Certificates & secrets

description: Connect to Pydantic AI agents via A2A protocol (with fake streaming support)

credential_fields.label: Agent URL
credential_fields.tooltip: The base URL for your Pydantic AI agent server

description: Connect to Google Cloud Vertex AI Reasoning Engines

credential_fields.label: Reasoning Engine Resource ID
credential_fields.tooltip: The full resource ID of your Vertex AI Reasoning Engine. Find this in Google Cloud Console under Vertex AI > Agent Builder > Your Agent.
